wordpressWpcContributors.bio: Mitch Canter is a senior web developer with Vanderbilt University. A 10-year veteran of the industry, he’s worked with small businesses and Fortune 500 companies to help empower people to tell their story online. Mitch is also a digital strategist, web designer, avid video gamer and spoony bard.

content.raw:
This session serves to answer the most-asked question I get as a developer: "How can I keep my WordPress site secure?"

This session will walk you through three major levels of security: server-level, site-level and external. And it'll explain how they all work together to ensure that your site's defenses are bolstered against any incoming threats. Finally, the session will dispel any common misconceptions and pinpoint common weak spots in an unprotected system.
